text: The 2000 Team China Four Nations Tournament () was the inaugural edition of the Four Nations Tournament, an official international football tournament hosted by the Chinese Football Association and International Sport and Leisure (ISL).今夏再搞四国赛拟请克罗地亚队 It was held from 14 to 16 January 2000 in Guangzhou, China. ==Participants== The original participants for the tournament were China, New Zealand, South Korea and Yugoslavia. Uruguay and Jamaica accept the invitation after South Korea and Yugoslavia quit in December 1999.四国邀请赛：牙买加与乌拉圭取代韩、南 * (host) * * * ==Venues== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Guangzhou |rowspan="4"| |- | align="center"|250px |- |Tianhe Stadium |- |Capacity: 60,000 |} ==Matches== All times are local, CST (UTC+8). ===Bracket=== ===Semi-finals=== ===Third-place playoff=== ===Final=== ==References== Category:Four Nations Tournament (China) Category:2000 in association football Category:Sports competitions in Guangzhou Category:2000 in Chinese football Category:January 2000 sports events in Asia Category:International association football competitions hosted by China Category:Football in Guangzhou
title: 2000 Four Nations Tournament (Guangzhou)
